name: Daniel Pereira
bio: Programming enthusiast, especially when using Vim, who started his coding adventure in high school. Loves Python and Elixir. If you want to find him, just look for a guy with a cap in CeSIUM.

name: David Machado
bio: Full-stack developer, started his coding journey at sixteen. As a vocational highschool graduation project he built a CSS framework. Currently studying Computer Science @ University of Minho.

name: Filipe Felício
bio: Started programming five years ago. Used to spend all day writing code in CeSIUM, still do from time to time. Elixir enthusiast, working @ Marmelasoft. Proud owner of a |> tattoo.

name: Henrique Pereira
bio: Admires everything that respects its user's freedom - that's why his Emacs journey started. Turn libre software more approachable to everyone is one of his purposes. Free as in free speech not as in free beer!

name: Ioannis Nezis
bio: Kubernetes, WebAssembly, Serverless, Cloud computing and Elixir - things he says that doesn't know shit about. He has his tippy toes in full stack development with Django and is trying to get into DevOps stuff. Procrastination enthusiast, working @ nothing important.

name: José Nuno Oliveira
bio: José Nuno Oliveira, mostly known as JNO, is a professor and researcher at University of Minho. His research aims at improving scientific standards in software design through formal methods and calculational techniques. He does this with passion and firmly believe this will make computing better in the future.
role: Professor and researcher @ University of Minho

name: Matilde Bravo
bio: Has a strong passion for everything Linux-related. Spends most of her time on the command line and doesn't like GUI's very much. If not on the computer, she's probably singing and playing with TMUM.

name: Rui Lopes
bio: Started programming four years ago and since then never stopped. Loves Python and is starting to love Elixir too. Joined CeSIUM to develop a lot more skills and meet new people. Aiming to install Arch Linux for the 15th time last week.

name: Rui Oliveira
bio: Started programming at 13 years old. Whilst in high school earned the chance to showcase his talents at several domestic and international programming contests. An active contributor and core team member to CeSIUM Open Source plataforms.
